text: Hey, is there a way to name a `@test` call? I'm iterating over a list of cases I want to test and would like to have a name for each iterate?

elements.text: Hey, is there a way to name a
call? I'm iterating over a list of cases I want to test and would like to have a name for each iterate?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
